definition: not in the least/to completely lack
hair/drawing brush/(in the) least/one thousandth/currency unit, 0.1 yuan
there cannot be another one like it
(idiom) (of soldiers) highly disciplined, not committing the slightest offence against civilians
to no avail/achieving nothing/totally ineffective/to have no effect/to fall flat (esp. of joke or speech that is completely ignored)

sentences.english: There is no doubt he is the "Rock Star" CEO.
sentences.chinese: 毫无疑问，他就是传说中的“摇滚明星式”CEO。

sentences.english: There is no doubt that travelling broadens one’s mind and enlarge/improve/increase one’s knowledge.
sentences.chinese: 毫无疑问，旅行使人开阔眼界，增长知识。

sentences.english: It surely ranks among the most valuable literary artifacts in America.
sentences.chinese: 毫无疑问，它算得上美国最珍贵的文学遗产之一。

sentences.english: But he must not espouse the old lady needlessly.
sentences.chinese: 不过，他不能毫无必要地娶那个老女人。

sentences.english: So let us seize it, not in fear,but in gladness.
sentences.chinese: 因此，让我们毫无畏惧，满心愉悦地把握命运。

sentences.english: Their intrusion into our private lives is unwarrantable .
sentences.chinese: 他们侵扰我们的私生活是毫无道理的。

sentences.english: A lot of people are saying, "Enough of this kind of effete culture.
sentences.chinese: 很多人都在说，“我们已经厌倦了这毫无生气的文化。

sentences.english: In fact, Yang Chengxing's case is by no means a rare one.
sentences.chinese: 事实上，毫无疑问，杨诚星的例子是很罕见的。

sentences.english: There’s no doubt that law schools have overbuilt and that the legal profession has overpromised.
sentences.chinese: 毫无疑问，法学院过多了，并对法定职业夸下海口。

sentences.english: No doubt inadvertently, Samsung feeds this delusion.
sentences.chinese: 毫无疑问，三星助长了这种错觉。

sentences.english: The lawyers are, no doubt, rubbing their hands.
sentences.chinese: 毫无疑问，律师们正摩拳擦掌，跃跃欲试。

sentences.english: Unsurprisingly, the product image and the bright orange buttons.
sentences.chinese: 毫无疑问，是产品图像和浅橙色的按钮。

sentences.english: “There’s no question that Dr. Kearns’ wiper circuit was interesting, ” Daykin says.
sentences.chinese: 毫无疑问，卡恩斯博士的雨刷电路是非常有意思的。

sentences.english: The plane could get through the edge less snow-plain without difficult.
sentences.chinese: 飞机能够毫无困难地飞越这一望无际的茫茫雪原。

sentences.english: Mentally strong people recognize that they don't need to please everyone all the time.
sentences.chinese: 内心强大之人深知随时溜须拍马毫无必要。

sentences.english: There is no love lost between Doris and Arvid.
sentences.chinese: 多丽丝和阿维德之间毫无爱情可言。

definition: the slightest amount or degree/a bit
hardly/not in the least/not at all
haven't/hasn't/doesn't exist/to not have/to not be
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
to be nothing to write home about (idiom)
but/yet/however/while/to go back/to decline/to retreat/nevertheless/even though
